value.title: Indian eCommerce player Snapdeal uses robots for last-mile delivery
value.excerpt: The Covid-19 led lockdown and its impact on eCommerce resulted in the federal government approving drone-based deliveries in India in June. Though nothing more was heard on this front since, online marketplace Snapdeal has now announced that it had conducted last-mile delivery using robots.
